title: Gym Membership Card (SD-JWT VC)
description: Logical claim set for the Gym Membership Card SD-JWT VC.

vct.description: Verifiable Credential Type identifier for this attestation.

gymName.description: Human-readable name of the gym that issued the membership.

memberId.description: Internal membership identifier, unique per issuer.

membershipTier.description: Membership tier defining included services and pricing.

nbf.description: Date from which the membership is valid (inclusive).

exp.description: Date until which the membership is valid (inclusive), assuming it is not revoked.
